channel.title: Ely|White Pine County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Ely|White Pine County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-6 West at US-93/US-50
item.description: US-6 West at US-93/US-50. Use US-6/US-50 East/US-93 South for Pioche and Delta (Utah); use US-50 West/US-93 North for Ely, Carson City, and Twin Falls (Idaho).

item.title: US-6 East - Ely
item.description: Entering Ely on US-6 west. Elevation 6435 Feet. Ely is the county seat of White Pine County. A US-6 postmile is in the background of the photo.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Lund Jct., Tonopah, and Las Vegas (via NV-318).

item.title: US-50 West - The Loneliest Road In America
item.description: The Loneliest Road in America on US-50 west. Taken at the west edge of Ely.

item.title: Mill St. at Clark St. (Bus. US-50)
item.description: Mill St. south at Clark St. in downtown Ely. Clark St. is one block south of the main route of US-50 and is signed as Bus. US-50. In this picture Bus. US-50 is shown as going in both directions, but Clark St. is one way eastbound.

item.title: US-6 West - Murry St.
item.description: US-6 west approaching Murry St. into the Ely Business District. Murry St. used to be the former route of US-6 into Ely.

item.title: US-6 West - Grand Army of the Republic Highway
item.description: US-6 west - Grand Army of the Republic Highway.

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Lund Jct., Tonopah, and Las Vegas (via NV-318).

item.title: US-6 West - Ely
item.description: US-6 west in Ely.

item.title: US-93 North at NV-490
item.description: US-93 north at NV-490 to Ely State Prison.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-490
item.description: US-93 North Approaching NV-490 to State Prison (Ely State Prison).

item.title: US-50 East at US-93
item.description: US-50 east at US-93. Continue ahead for US-93 north to McGill and Twin Falls (Idaho). Turn right for US-93 and US-50 for Delta (Utah) and Las Vegas. US-50 joins US-93 south over Sacramento Pass.

item.title: US-50 East at US-93
item.description: US-50 east at US-93. US-50 joins US-93 through Ely to Majors Junction. Use US-93 South/US-50 East for US-6.

item.title: US-93 North/US-6 West/US-50 West at US-6
item.description: US-93 North/US-6 West/US-50 West at US-6 West junction. Use US-6 west for Lund Jct. and Tonopah. Use US-93 North/US-50 West for Twin Falls (Idaho via US-93) and Carson City (via US-50).

item.title: US-93 North - Entering Ely
item.description: Entering Ely - Elevation 6435 on US-93 North. Ely is the county seat of White Pine County.

item.title: US-93 North - Entering Ely Shoshone Indian Reservation
item.description: US-93 North - Entering Ely Shoshone Indian Reservation. The Ely Shoshone Indian Reservation is a small reservation on the outskirts of Ely.

item.title: US-93 South/US-50 East at US-6
item.description: US-93 South/US-50 East at US-6 junction. US-6 combines with US-93 South to Majors Place; US-6 joins US-50 east to Delta, Utah. Turn right on US-6 west for Lund Junction and Tonopah. Continue straight on US-6/US-50 East/US-93 south for Pioche and Delta (Utah).

item.title: US-93 South at US-50 - Ely
item.description: US-93 south at US-50 in Ely. US-50 joins US-93 south to Majors Place. Continue straight for US-50 west to Eureka and Carson City. Turn left for US-93 South/US-50 East to Delta (Utah), Las Vegas, and US-6.

item.title: US-93 North/US-50 West
item.description: US-93 North/US-50 West to Carson City, Twin Falls, and McGill. Taken immediatley north of US-6 west junction

item.title: US-93 North/US-50 West at US-50 West
item.description: US-93 North/US-50 West at US-50 West to Carson City/Eureka, and US-93 North to McGill/Twin Falls

item.title: US-93 North/US-50 West at US-6 West
item.description: US-93 North/US-50 West at US-6 west

item.title: US-93 North/US-50 West/US-6 West at US-6
item.description: US-93/US-6/US-50 North/West at US-6 West to Lund Junction and Tonopah
